attributes.action: Increase the rating of Dmitryo Chyhrynskyi from its present 63....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
....in the In Off The Post online football management game.

The guy's just signed for Barcelona, and he's rated the same as Titus Bramble!

Dear Gordon. Please apply diplomatic pressure onto In Off The Post, and crush their dissent with the might of your weighty intellect.

I'd be happy with a 65. For now - but I'll be grumbling again at Christmas.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
